successes.title: CloudFTP. Wirelessly share ANY USB storage with iPad, iPhone
successes.description: A tiny battery powered adapter that makes any USB storage device wireless, accessible to Apple iPad, iPhone and Internet (e.g. Dropbox)

Pledges.description: Every dollar counts. By pledging $1 or more, you will be immortalized as a "backer" in the credits on the CloudFTP web, iOS and Android app. The more you pledge, the earlier you pledge, the higher your name will appear on the official backers credit list.
You will be one of the first in the world to get a CloudFTP in the color of your choice. Price includes domestic USA shipping. Please add $10 for international shipping.
For $69 pledge you will get a CloudFTP, which will sell for $99.95 at retail. Price includes domestic USA shipping. Please add $15 for international shipping.
You will be one of the first in the world to get not one but TWO (2) CloudFTP in the color of your choice. Price includes domestic USA shipping. Please add $20 ($10/unit) for international shipping.

You will be one of the first in the world to get not one but THREE (3) CloudFTP in the color of your choice. Price includes domestic USA shipping. Please add $30 ($10/unit) for international shipping.
You will be one of the first in the world to get not one but FOUR (4) CloudFTP in the color of your choice

We will personally thank you by mentioning your name and featuring your photo in a full page color advertisement on the back cover of UK's iPad & iPhone User Magazine (circulation: 18,000) or UK's Tap! The iPhone & iPad Magazine (circulation: 18,000). Limit 1 backer per magazine ad.
Silver Backer. You will be one of the first in the world to get not one but FIVE (5) CloudFTP in the color of your choice

We will personally thank you by mentioning your name and featuring your photo in a full page color advertisement on the back cover of Macworld UK Magazine (circulation: 23,000) or MacFormat UK Magazine (circulation: 29,000). Limit 1 backer per magazine ad.
You will be one of the first in the world to get not one but SIX (6) CloudFTP in the color of your choice
